item.title: 纽约银行将收购 Archer，加强资产和财富管理机构的管理账户服务
item.description: 纽约银行（BNY）与Archer公司周四表示，两家公司已同意收购Archer公司，后者是一家技术和运营提供商，将帮助该美国银行扩大对资产和财富管理公司的服务。【原文：BNY has agreed to buy Archer, a technology and operations provider that will help the U.S. bank expand its services to asset and wealth managers, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国 8 月私营部门就业人数创 3 年半以来最小增幅
item.description: 8 月份，美国私营雇主的招聘人数创下了 3 年半以来的最低水平，上个月的数据也被下调，这可能暗示着劳动力市场正在急剧放缓。【原文：U.S. private employers hired the fewest number of workers in 3-1/2-years in August and data for the prior month was revised lower, potentially hinting at a sharp labor market slowdown.】

item.title: Visa 前首席执行官加入通用汽车董事会
item.description: 通用汽车公司周四表示，Visa 前董事长兼首席执行官小阿尔弗雷德-凯利（Alfred Kelly）已加入该公司董事会。【原文：General Motors said on Thursday Alfred Kelly, Jr., former chairman and CEO of Visa , has joined its board of directors.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：特朗普将采纳马斯克关于政府效率委员会的建议
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）计划在一次演讲中概述一系列经济建议，其中将包括由亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）推荐的政府效率委员会。【原文：Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump plans to outline a suite of economic proposals in a speech, which will include a government efficiency commission recommended by billionaire Elon Musk, The Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing parts of the speech it has seen.】

item.title: 世界黄金协会称，全球黄金 ETF 在 8 月份迎来第四个流入月
item.description: 世界黄金协会（WGC）周四表示，由于在北美和欧洲上市的基金增持黄金，8月份全球实物黄金交易所交易基金（ETF）连续第四个月出现资金流入。【原文：Global physically backed gold exchange traded funds (ETFs) saw the fourth consecutive month of inflows in August due to additions to holdings by North America- and Europe-listed funds, the World Gold Council (WGC) said on Thursday.】

item.title: PayPal 推出现金返还奖励并与苹果公司整合，进军个人支付领域
item.description: 全球在线支付巨头贝宝公司（PayPal）正通过将其借记卡与苹果手机钱包整合并提供返现奖励，进军美国销售点支付领域，寻求与科技公司和银行展开直接竞争。【原文：PayPal is expanding into U.S. point-of-sale payments by integrating its debit card with Apple's mobile wallet and offering cashback rewards, as the global online payments giant seeks direct competition with tech companies and banks.】

item.title: 监管机构称空客A350机队部分机型面临检查
item.description: 国泰航空一架A350-1000客机在飞行过程中发动机部件发生故障，欧洲航空安全监管机构周四表示，作为预防措施，至少将对空客A350机队的部分机型进行检查。【原文：At least part of Airbus's A350 fleet will be inspected as a precautionary measure, Europe's aviation safety regulator said on Thursday, after an engine part failed during the flight of a Cathay Pacific A350-1000 passenger plane.】

item.title: 亚马逊计划 2024 年从印度出口 50 亿美元小商品，以取代中国市场
item.description: 亚马逊公司的一位官员说，该公司计划今年从印度出口约 50 亿美元的小商品，比 2023 年的近 30 亿美元有所增长，供应美国和英国等市场，这标志着亚马逊将从中国转向印度。【原文：Amazon Inc plans to export about $5 billion of small-ticket items from India this year, up from nearly $3 billion in 2023, supplying markets such as the United States and Britain, a company official said, marking a shift away from China.】

item.title: 民意调查显示，巴西人对 X 停职意见不一
item.description: 一项民意调查显示，巴西人对最高法院法官亚历山大-德-莫赖斯（Alexandre de Moraes）下令在巴西关闭社交媒体巨头 X 的做法意见不一。【原文：Brazilians are split over Supreme Court Justice Alexandre de Moraes' order for social media giant X to be taken down in the country, a poll shows.】

item.title: 消息称中国美的集团将在香港发行至少 30 亿美元股票
item.description: 两位消息人士称，中国家电制造商美的集团计划最早于周一在香港发行股票，筹资至少 30 亿美元，这是一年多来香港最大的一笔交易。【原文：Chinese home appliance maker Midea Group plans to launch a share offering in Hong Kong to raise at least $3 billion as early as Monday, said two sources, in the city's largest deal in more than a year.】

item.title: 招聘公司 Challenger 称，8 月份美国计划裁员人数激增
item.description: 周四公布的月度裁员统计显示，在经济增长前景不明和持续的成本担忧下，8月份美国雇主公布的裁员人数为五个月来最多，其中科技行业的裁员人数居首。【原文：U.S. employers in August unveiled the greatest number of layoffs in five months, led by cuts in the technology sector, amid a cloudy outlook for growth and ongoing cost concerns, a monthly tally of workforce reduction announcements showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 夏季需求强劲，捷蓝航空上调第三季度收入预期
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）周四上调了第三季度收入预期，原因是夏季旅游需求旺盛，这使得该公司股价在盘前交易中上涨了近 7%。【原文：JetBlue Airways boosted its third-quarter revenue forecast on Thursday, owing to strong travel demand during the summer season, sending its shares nearly 7% higher in premarket trading.】

item.title: 董事长表示，新任首席执行官必须使戴姆勒卡车适应疲软的市场
item.description: 德国戴姆勒卡车公司董事长乔-凯瑟（Joe Kaeser）周四表示，戴姆勒卡车公司预计商用车需求将进一步放缓，其新任首席执行官必须为此采取措施进行调整。【原文：Daimler Truck expects a further slowdown in demand for commercial vehicles and its new CEO must take measures to adjust for that, the German company's Chairman Joe Kaeser said on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将于下周和 12 月降息；2025 年降息幅度较浅
item.description: 在路透社的一项民意调查中，绝大多数经济学家预测欧洲央行将在 9 月 12 日下调存款利率 25 个基点，并在 12 月再次下调。【原文：The European Central Bank will cut its deposit rate by 25 basis points on Sept. 12 and again in December, according to a significant majority of economists in a Reuters poll who predict shallower rate cuts in 2025 than markets are expecting.】

item.title: 法院顾问称，欧盟最高法院应驳回法航-荷航卡特尔罚款上诉
item.description: 欧洲最高法院的一位顾问周四表示，欧洲最高法院应驳回法航荷航及其荷兰分部荷航、英国航空、新加坡航空及其一些同行对欧盟反垄断监管机构在2017年对卡特尔处以罚款的上诉。【原文：Europe's top court should reject an appeal by Air France KLM and its Dutch unit KLM, British Airways , Singapore Airlines and some of their peers against cartel fines imposed by EU antitrust regulators in 2017, an adviser to the court said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Seven & i 将要求 Couche-Tard 重新考虑 "不适当 "的报价
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周四称，日本零售巨头 Seven & i 将通知加拿大 Alimentation Couche-Tard，其收购价格 "不够"。【原文：Japanese retail giant Seven & i will inform Canada's Alimentation Couche-Tard that its takeover bid price is "inadequate", a source familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 特斯拉计划在欧洲和中国推出全自动驾驶汽车，股价因此上涨
item.description: 特斯拉股价周四上涨了 2.5%，因为这家电动汽车制造商坚持在中国和欧洲推出全自动驾驶（FSD）高级驾驶辅助软件的计划，并等待这两个地区监管机构的批准。【原文：Tesla shares rose 2.5% on Thursday after the electric automaker stuck to its plans to roll out the Full Self-Driving (FSD) advanced driver assistance software in China and Europe pending approval from regulators in the regions.】

item.title: 就业数据公布前市场谨慎情绪弥漫，期指走势低迷
item.description: 在周四一系列经济数据公布之前，美国股指期货持平或小幅走低，投资者正在寻找线索，以确定美联储本月晚些时候降息的幅度。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were flat to marginally lower ahead of a series of economic data on Thursday as investors scoured for clues to determine the size of the Federal Reserve's interest rate cut that is expected later this month.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔任命 Mike Stepniak 为新任首席财务官
item.description: 霍尼韦尔公司周四表示，公司首席财务官格雷格-刘易斯（Greg Lewis）将卸任，由迈克-斯蒂普尼亚克（Mike Stepniak）接任。【原文：Honeywell's chief financial officer Greg Lewis will step down from his role and will be succeeded by Mike Stepniak, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 伊利亚-苏茨克沃（Ilya Sutskever）谈人工智能将如何改变以及他的新创业公司 Safe Superintelligence
item.description: OpenAI 前首席科学家伊利亚-苏茨基弗（Ilya Sutskever）成立了一家名为 "安全超级智能"（SSI）的新公司，旨在开发远超人类能力的安全人工智能系统。【原文：Ilya Sutskever, OpenAI's former chief scientist, has launched a new company called Safe Superintelligence (SSI), aiming to develop safe artificial intelligence systems that far surpass human capabilities.】

item.title: C3.ai 季度订阅收入疲软，暴跌 20
item.description: 企业人工智能软件制造商 C3.ai 的股价在周四的盘前交易中暴跌 20%，原因是试点客户的缓慢转化挤压了订阅收入。【原文：Shares of C3.ai , which makes software for enterprise artificial intelligence, slumped 20% in premarket trading on Thursday, as subscription revenue was squeezed by slow conversions of pilot customers.】

item.title: 洞察力：巴西部落土地上非法种植的大豆进入全球市场
item.description: 据部落领袖和法庭记录称，为世界上一些最大的跨国农业公司供货的巴西农场合作社正在购买在该国土著保留地上非法种植的大豆，尽管这些公司公开承诺尊重土著人民的土地权利和资源。【原文：Farm cooperatives in Brazil that supply some of the world's biggest multinational agricultural firms are buying soybeans grown illegally on Indigenous reservations in the country, according to tribal leaders and court records, despite the companies' public pledges to respect the land rights and resources of Indigenous peoples.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场转向利率和就业，股市趋于平静
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 聚焦：价格下滑，皮德蒙特锂公司撤回美国政府贷款申请
item.description: 皮德蒙特锂公司（Piedmont Lithium）已经撤回了向美国政府贷款计划申请一揽子债务的申请，并正在缩减横跨两大洲的雄心勃勃的扩张计划，因为电动汽车电池金属价格的暴跌迫使这家美国矿商节约现金。【原文：Piedmont Lithium has pulled its application for a debt package from a popular U.S. government loan program and is scaling back ambitious expansion plans across two continents, as tumbling prices of the electric vehicle battery metal force the U.S. miner to conserve cash.】

item.title: Verizon 将以 200 亿美元收购 Frontier，以加强光纤网络建设
item.description: Verizon 周四表示，它将以全现金交易的方式收购 Frontier Communications，交易价值为 200 亿美元，这家美国无线运营商希望借此增强其光纤网络。【原文：Verizon said on Thursday it would buy Frontier Communications in an all-cash deal valued at $20 billion, as the U.S. wireless carrier looks to boost its fiber network.】

item.title: 保守派质疑巴西禁止马斯克的 X 可能会使双方的争斗升级
item.description: 巴西的一个保守党正在寻求推翻法官对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 平台的禁令，这有可能使南美最大国家长达数月之久的审查和仇恨言论之争升级。【原文：A conservative party in Brazil is seeking to reverse a judge's ban on Elon Musk's X platform, potentially escalating the months-long feud over censorship and hate speech in South America's largest country.】

item.title: 宝马计划从 2028 年起向市场投放首款氢能汽车
item.description: 德国汽车制造商宝马公司周四表示，该公司的目标是利用与丰田汽车公司共同开发的燃料电池技术，于2028年向市场推出首款氢动力汽车。【原文：BMW aims to bring its first hydrogen-powered vehicle onto the market in 2028, using fuel cell technology developed with Toyota Motor Corp , the German carmaker said on Thursday.】

item.title: 航空公司如何应对国泰航空空客 A350 发动机故障？
item.description: 本周一，香港国泰航空公司发现有 15 架飞机在飞行途中因发动机部件故障而需要维修燃油管路，随后多家航空公司正在对其空客 A350 机队进行预防性检查。【原文：Several airlines are carrying out precautionary inspections on their Airbus A350 fleets after Hong Kong's Cathay Pacific found 15 planes that needed fuel line repairs following the in-flight failure of an engine part on Monday.】

item.title: 中国碧桂园解除普华永道审计师职务
item.description: 碧桂园控股周四表示，根据房地产开发商的建议，普华永道（PwC）已辞去其审计师一职，这使其成为与陷入困境的审计公司断绝关系的最新一家中国公司。【原文：Country Garden Holdings on Thursday said PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) has resigned as its auditor following the property developer's recommendation, making it the latest Chinese company to sever ties with the troubled auditing firm.】

item.title: 报纸《Trouw》称，俄罗斯公司为使用了 25 年的 ASML 机器购买备件
item.description: 荷兰报纸《Trouw》周四援引俄罗斯海关文件报道称，尽管欧盟实施了制裁，但俄罗斯公司仍能在二级市场上获得 2022 年至 2023 年使用了 25 年的 ASML 芯片制造机的备件。【原文：Russian firms were able to obtain spare parts for 25-year-old ASML chipmaking machines in 2022 to 2023 on secondary markets despite European Union sanctions, Dutch newspaper Trouw reported on Thursday, citing Russian customs documents.】
